name: Storm Kata
description:
Susano moves thrice in quick succession; after each attack he has up to 3s to fire the next one.
First Attack: 100% Damage to all Enemies in a cone.
Second Attack: 100% Damage to all Enemies in a circle.
Third Attack: 50% Damage while Dashing forward.
stats: Damage Per Hit: 40/65/90/115/140 (+50% of your physical power)
